title: New Roval Terra CL & Terra C carbon gravel wheels, plus all-new carbon gravel bars
content:
New Roval Terra CL & Terra C carbon wheelsets bring high-performance within reach of more gravel riders with new lower pricing. There’s no shortage of wheels from the Roval camp, coming off the release of more affordable road and mountain line offerings. The Morgan Hill wheel manufacturer has been adding a new tier to their […]

The post New Roval Terra CL & Terra C carbon gravel wheels, plus all-new carbon gravel bars appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
